casebody.data:
State
v.
Rayford Lewis Burke 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2016

Mr. Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Ms. Gretchen Engel, Mr. Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorneys at Law, For Burke, Rayford Lewis.

Ms. Danielle Marquis Elder, Mr. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Mr. Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Ms. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2016."

Ervin, J recused

Defendant shall have up to and including the 21st day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
